tooltip.soulflow.totem_of_transference.l: §7A totem found in structures, or from witches.
§7Exchanges your life with a targeted player.
item.soulflow.totem_of_transference.mess: §4You need to use this on a player.
tooltip.soulflow.void_totem.line2: §7Exchanges your life with a random nearby player.
tooltip.soulflow.totem_of_spores.line1: §7A totem only found through killing mooshrooms.
tooltip.soulflow.totem_of_spores.line2: §7Mimicks the appearance of a targeted player.
item.soulflow.totem_of_spores.message.Ot: §4You need to use this on a player.
tooltip.soulflow.sunken_grimoire.line1: §7An old book only found by interacting with oceans.
item.soulflow.sunken_grimoire.message.Ot: §4You need to use this on an undead mob.
painting.soulflow.witch.author: §7phini_
painting.soulflow.witch.title: §bTotem Hunt
commands.soulflow.disabledmsgs.message: §4This command has been disabled through a gamerule.
gamerule.soulflow:disablePrivateMessages: Disable the /msg command (to not reveal players identity)
gamerule.soulflow:exchangeEffects: Exchange players effects upon a soul exchange
gamerule.soulflow:exchangeEnderchests: Exchange the content of players enderchest upon a soul exchange
gamerule.soulflow:exchangeHealth: Exchange players health upon a soul exchange
gamerule.soulflow:exchangeInventories: Exchange players Inventories upon a soul exchange
